name: Rubber Ducky Labs
headline: We know recommender systems.
description: Do you want to optimize revenue, engagement, or both? Our team of experts will get you great results, quickly.

founders.name: Alexandra Johnson, Founder
founders.description: Alexandra has spent eight years in the ML tooling industry (starting with a 4-year stint as the first software engineer at @SigOpt) to help make the state of the art in machine learning effortless and easy to use. Before that, she worked on recommender systems in fashion tech. She founded Rubber Ducky Labs to be the suite of dream tools that she wished she had while working on recommender systems.

# We Know Recommender Systems.
Do you want to optimize revenue, engagement, or both? Talk to our team of experts to get started.
[ Book a Call ](https://www.rubberduckylabs.io/<https:/calendly.com/d/cpjt-wj5-nty/rubber-ducky-labs-team-meeting-30m>)
## We’re Experts in Recommender Systems
![Alexandra Johnson, CEO of Rubber Ducky Labs](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/61e082f46c87cc741e8ffc78/d71ef242-2d13-45f8-98f4-aac97fa859f7/image-asset.jpeg)
#### Alexandra Johnson, CEO
[ ![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/61e082f46c87cc741e8ffc78/f94657f1-3fde-4661-973a-6cae541d6da5/linkedin-logo.png) ](https://www.rubberduckylabs.io/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/alexandraj777/>)
[ ![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/61e082f46c87cc741e8ffc78/e5316282-577b-464e-bb91-c34e55dee8f9/twitter-logo.png) ](https://www.rubberduckylabs.io/<https:/twitter.com/alexandraj777>)
Alexandra has a degree in computer science from Carnegie Mellon University. She started her career working on recommender systems in fashion tech at Polyvore ([acquired](https://www.rubberduckylabs.io/<https:/techcrunch.com/2015/07/31/yahoo-acquires-polyvore/>) by Yahoo in 2015), before joining an early pioneer in the ML tools space, SigOpt ([acquired](https://www.rubberduckylabs.io/<https:/techcrunch.com/2020/10/29/intel-acquires-sigopt-a-specialist-in-modeling-optimization-to-boost-its-ai-business/>) by Intel in 2020), where she led the Platform Team. She holds two patents in ML tooling.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/61e082f46c87cc741e8ffc78/68e11de8-aae8-4bc9-af93-4061baa7c228/john_scotland.png)
#### John McDonnell, CTO
[ ![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/61e082f46c87cc741e8ffc78/f94657f1-3fde-4661-973a-6cae541d6da5/linkedin-logo.png) ](https://www.rubberduckylabs.io/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/john-mcdonnell-65833233/>)
[ ![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/61e082f46c87cc741e8ffc78/e5316282-577b-464e-bb91-c34e55dee8f9/twitter-logo.png) ](https://www.rubberduckylabs.io/<https:/twitter.com/johnvmcdonnell>)
John led the recommender systems ML group at Stitch Fix and has built transformative ML solutions spanning risk, recommender systems, and paid acquisition at Square (now Block) and Stitch Fix. His PhD from NYU is in Cognitive Science with a focus on computational modeling and holds one patent in recommender systems.
## Industry Agnostic
Any consumer business can leverage recommender systems to boost revenue and engagement. Curious how? Get in touch with our team!
E-commerce
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/61e082f46c87cc741e8ffc78/c68c4da1-4906-4df2-b527-496d8c3a9bc3/shopping-cart.png)
Marketplaces
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/61e082f46c87cc741e8ffc78/19583f74-216e-4384-b247-2eb325b7edce/building-store.png)
Streaming media
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/61e082f46c87cc741e8ffc78/71d87e51-8ef3-4599-af49-a64543e52bc0/movie.png)
Video games
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/61e082f46c87cc741e8ffc78/c1d4c287-ba80-4a89-8405-973b0f77b972/device-gamepad-2.png)
## Our venture partners
[ ![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/61e082f46c87cc741e8ffc78/670d5537-7aa5-43dd-a450-5c5e671cac73/YC+Logo+Expanded+%E2%80%94+Orange.png) ](https://www.rubberduckylabs.io/<https:/www.ycombinator.com>)
[ ![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/61e082f46c87cc741e8ffc78/07ed8382-fd06-4d9f-b19b-c497b14a24b1/BCV-Blue-RGB.png) ](https://www.rubberduckylabs.io/<https:/baincapitalventures.com>)
[ ![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/61e082f46c87cc741e8ffc78/2f2319ee-a87f-432c-b0de-5741b3a512b5/Screenshot+2023-06-30+at+5.29.26+PM.png) ](https://www.rubberduckylabs.io/<https:/cadenza.vc>)
## Let’s Talk
Ready to elevate your team’s recommender system? Schedule a free 30-minute RecSys consultation with the Rubber Ducky Labs team.
[ Book a Call ](https://www.rubberduckylabs.io/<https:/calendly.com/d/cpjt-wj5-nty/rubber-ducky-labs-team-meeting-30m>)

generated_description:
**Rubber Ducky Labs: The Recommender System Experts**

Founded in 2022 and a part of Y Combinator's Winter 2023 batch, Rubber Ducky Labs is a startup specializing in recommender systems. The mission? To optimize revenue and engagement for consumer businesses through advanced recommendation technologies.

**Who They Are**

At the helm is Alexandra Johnson, the CEO, who has a solid background in computer science from Carnegie Mellon University. Her journey began with Polyvore, where she worked on recommender systems in the fashion tech space. Following that, she contributed to SigOpt, a pioneer in machine learning tools. With two patents in ML tooling under her belt, Alexandra's expertise is substantial.

John McDonnell, the CTO, brings his own wealth of experience, having led recommender system projects at Stitch Fix and developed machine learning solutions for Square. His academic credentials include a PhD in Cognitive Science from NYU, along with expertise in computational modeling.

**What They Do**

Rubber Ducky Labs focuses on enhancing the performance of businesses by leveraging recommender systems. They are industry-agnostic, meaning businesses from e-commerce, marketplaces, streaming media, to video games can benefit from their innovative approaches. Their services are designed to rapidly deliver tangible results, catering to businesses looking to elevate their user engagement and revenue.

**Getting In Touch**

Want to optimize your digital strategies? Rubber Ducky Labs is inviting teams for consultations to kickstart transformative projects in recommender systems. You can learn more and schedule a 30-minute session through their website: [Rubber Ducky Labs](https://www.rubberduckylabs.io/).

With a dedicated team currently in its infancy—just one full-time member—Rubber Ducky Labs stands poised to make waves in the realm of recommender systems, helping businesses navigate the intricacies of user engagement and revenue enhancement. If you're in the market for innovative solutions, this is a name to remember.
